description: selection of pages (numbered 259-272) from a publication with an image of a man sitting on a chair reading a newspaper with a bed in the background; underneath the image is the title "Chronik" followed by paragraphs of text; published by Verlag Heinrich Hochstim in Berlin; two sheets of plain brown paper are inserted in the magazine: in black ink with cursive script one reads "Privat exempl." and the other sheet reads "Nur einmal vorhanden!"
inscription: LL margin of cover page, in pencil: E. 45 | LRC of cover page, in pencil: 2101 [written on piece of green tape] / 2101 | LLC of back page, in pencil: 2101
medium: Lithograph on front page of magazine with text
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 17.
title: Reading Man
